name: vite-go
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript with TailwindCSS and Axios for the frontend and a Go server with static file and APIs server a Gin router. It includes a Makefile to build locally and to build a container.

name: vite-csharp
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript with TailwindCSS and Axios for the frontend and a C# server with static file and APIs server. It includes a Makefile to build locally and to build a container.

name: vite-rust
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript with TailwindCSS and Axios for the frontend and a Rust server with static file and APIs server a Rocket router. It includes a Makefile to build locally and to build a container.
